subject: Re: [junit] javax.swing.JOptionPane showMessageDialog not working in Junit
msgSnippet: I m not sure, but I think your application may be terminating right after displaying the message box. Could you try to call the setVisible(true) method on the
messageBody:
I'm not sure, but I think your application may be terminating right after
displaying the message box. Could you try to call the setVisible(true)
method on the frame before trying to show the dialog?

2008/7/17 douglaskunzman <douglaskunzman@...>:
